extendedInfo.description: Whether you're a parenting pro or are just beginning your journey, Chandler Regional Medical Center will be with you along the way. Our Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU) app places information at your fingertips, providing information for mothers-to-be and support for parents with babies in the NICU.This is all free to you as part of the communities we serve.Features:Tours and Videos:  From taking a virtual tour of our NICU and learning about breastfeeding, to finding helpful tips on hand expressing and formula safety, we've got you covered.  Track My Baby: Learn what to expect from your baby as they grow. Our tool allows you to log their growth, from monitoring height, weight and head circumference from date of birth through first year of life.Feeding My Baby: Whether you're breast or bottle feeding, you can time and track your baby's feedings using our feeding log.Spiritual Care: We understand that you and your family are going through a scary time. We're here for you every step of the way, and hope these inspirational quotes offer comfort.Follow Up Care: Find a pediatrician that meets your family's needs with a tap of a button!Find My Hospital: Get directions to the hospital or to one of our conveniently located urgent care centers. You can also follow us on Facebook or Twitter to learn about support groups and classes, and to connect with other moms in your area!About Chandler Regional Medical Center Chandler Regional Medical Center is a not-for-profit organization that provides integrated patient- and family-centered care. Chandler Regional Medical Center is a Dignity Health Member, which is the fifth largest health system in the country with 10,000 physicians and 55,000 employees across Arizona, California, and Nevada. Through its network of more than 150 ancillary care sites and 40 acute care hospitals, Dignity Health is committed to delivering compassionate, high-quality, affordable health care services.
